Account Officer Job at KAAF Specialist Hospital




        
    

        
        KAAF Specialist Hospital is a highly ethical organization, providing Obstetric and Gynaecological, Paediatric, and other healthcare services, with a commitment to excellence and integrity. We are on amission to provide qualitative, innovative, and integrated services for women and children, using state of the art equipment and motivated personnel to exceed our clientele’s expectation at affordable prices.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer

Job Location: Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
     

            
    



Description
We are on the hunt for a highly analytical and qualified Accounts Officer to join our team. In this pivotal position, your duties will include the following:


	Pposting standard journal entries,
	Managing and reconciling Health Management Organization (HMO) claims and receivables,
	Reconciling payables and bank activities,
	Monitoring financial transactions,
	Assisting with budgets,
	Participating in audits, and serving as the primary liaison between the hospital and HMO partners to ensure prompt and accurate payments.


Qualifications


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor’s Degree or HND in Accounting or Finance with 2-3 years’ experience in a similar role.
	In-depth knowledge of financial regulations and accounting processes.
	Proven experience in HMO claims management, reconciliation, and liaison within a healthcare setting is essential.


Requirements:


	To succeed in this role, you must demonstrate in-depth knowledge of financial policies, procedures, and systems.
	In addition to being an excellent communicator, our ideal candidate must be a detailed person with outstanding analytical and time management abilities.
	Candidate must be proficient in the use of Microsoft Excel and at least one accounting software (preferably Sage ERP).


Salary
N130,000 - N180,000 / Month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: kaafmlmclagos@outlook.com using “Accounts Officer” as the subject of the email.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Senior MLops Engineer Job at Yassir




        
    

        
        Yassir is the leading super App in the Maghreb region set to changing the way daily services are provided. It currently operates in 45 cities across Algeria, Morocco and Tunisia with recent expansions into France, Canada and Sub-Saharan Africa. It is backed (~$200M in funding) by VCs from Silicon Valley, Europe and other parts of the world.

We offer on-demand services such as ride-hailing and last-mile delivery. Building on this infrastructure, we are now introducing financial services to help our users pay, save and borrow digitally. Helping usher the continent into a digital economy era. We’re not just about serving people - we’re about creating a marketplace to bring people what they need while infusing social values.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior MLops Engineer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-tim

About the Role


	Yassir is seeking a highly skilled and motivated MLOps Engineer (of any senior level) to join our Artificial Intelligence (AI) team and drive our ML Operations in application deployment and infrastructure development enabling the training, deployment, experimentation, monitoring and altogether management of our ML applications and their artefacts, at scale and at speed.
	As an MLOps Engineer, you will play a crucial role in making Yassir’s products and operations more AI driven, through the use of modern technologies.
	This is a very exciting opportunity, tackling some of Yassir’s most critical problems.
